actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).

official_title: Of inquiry directing the Director of National Intelligence to transmit certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to the investigation by the intelligence community into the origins of the COVID-19 virus.

summary.text: This resolution directs the Office of the Director of National Intelligence to provide the House of Representatives any documents and information about the investigation by the intelligence community into the origins of the COVID-19 virus.

titles.title: Of inquiry directing the Director of National Intelligence to transmit certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to the investigation by the intelligence community into the origins of the COVID-19 virus.
